Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Relates to the tuition methodology for special education schools and programs
Summary: Clarifies that the tuition methodology for 853 schools, special act public school districts and 4410 programs will authorize them to retain funds prior to the implementation of the reconciliation process of the methodology, including cost screens.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the tuition methodology for special education schools and programs
